com.wingman.client.api.net

Class HttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.okhttp.OkHttpClient
      • com.wingman.client.api.net.HttpClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class HttpClient
extends com.squareup.okhttp.OkHttpClient
    HttpClient contains the recommended API for handling web requests.

    It utilizes the OkHttpClient library for efficient request handling.

    Request caching is not enabled by default because of potential file conflict in the event of multiple client instances being run at the same time.

      • downloadUrlAsync

        public void downloadUrlAsync(java.lang.String url,
                             com.squareup.okhttp.Callback callback)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs an asynchronous request to the URL specified, and places it on the OkHttp worker thread. The instance of Callback specified in the arguments is called upon completion of the request.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of your request
        callback - the Callback called after request completion
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the download failed

      • getContentLength

        public int getContentLength(java.lang.String url)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Sends a HEAD request to the URL specified and returns the value of the Content-Length response header.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to get the Content-Length of
        Returns:
        the Content-Length of the URL
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the download failed
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the Content-Length returned is not a number

      • getRequestBuilder

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Request.Builder getRequestBuilder()
